title: Magic Slippers
description: A girl finds slippers that make her jump very high. Each page she jumps over park, river, houses, even mountains.

pages.title: Mysterious Slippers
pages.description: Ichiko finds strange slippers in her room

sentences.あるひ、いちこのへやにふしぎなスリッパがおちていました。: One day, mysterious slippers were lying in Ichiko's room.

pages.title: Light as a Feather
pages.description: The slippers make her feel light

sentences.はいてみると、からだがふわっとかるくなりました。: When she put them on, her body became light as a feather.

sentences.いちこがぴょんととぶと、つくえをひととび！: When Ichiko jumped with a hop, she cleared the desk in one leap!

pages.title: House Jump
pages.description: She jumps over the house roof

sentences.もういちどとぶと、いえのやねもひととび！: When she jumped again, she cleared the house roof in one leap!

pages.title: Higher and Higher
pages.description: The slippers make her jump even higher

sentences.スリッパはどんどんたかくはねます。: The slippers made her jump higher and higher.

sentences.いちこはかわをこえ、もりをこえました。: Ichiko jumped over the river and over the forest.

sentences.やまをこえて、ほしにてがとどきそうです。: She jumped over the mountain and almost reached the stars.

pages.title: Amazing!
pages.description: Ichiko is amazed by her adventure

pages.title: Getting Tired
pages.description: Ichiko gets sleepy and comes down

sentences.でも、ねむくなって、ゆっくりおりてきました。: But she got sleepy and slowly came back down.

pages.title: Back Home
pages.description: Ichiko returns to bed with the slippers

sentences.ベッドにただいま。スリッパはしずかにまくらのそばにありました。: Back to bed. The slippers were quietly by her pillow.
